arts.ttl: Fulham XI vs Everton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Fulham travel to Merseyside today with a renewed sense of confidence. Their emphatic 3-0 victory over Wolves last weekend successfully ended a painful four-match losing streak. As a result, that win lifted them to 15th in the table, just one point behind their opponents, Everton. arts.ttl: Everton vs Fulham – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Everton return to Hill Dickinson Stadium on Saturday, aiming to end a poor run of form that has seen them win just one of their last seven league games. David Moyes’ side also lost their last home match to Tottenham. Therefore, they will be desperate to avoid back-to-back home defeats. arts.ttl: Everton vs Fulham – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Everton are searching for just their second win in eight league games. They host Fulham on Saturday in a crucial lower-table clash at Hill Dickinson Stadium. David Moyes’ side, who sit 14th, have struggled for consistent results. However, they now face a 15th-placed Fulham team that received a major confidence boost last weekend. arts.ttl: Marco Silva speaks about the anticipation of his ‘first experience’ at a new home for Everton
arts.sum: It’s always good when you go back to a place where you are going to see familiar faces and some people that you know well, and people that treat you very well. “But we have to look back, and the way this group of players changed completely the story of this football club recently against Everton away from home, just shows what we have been doing.
